relevant_findings.description: FBI document related to JFK Assassination Records Act release
relevant_findings.direct_quote: 2025 RELEASE UNDER THE PRESIDENT JOHN F. KENNEDY ASSASSINATION RECORDS ACT OF 1992
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates ongoing document declassification process for JFK assassination records

relevant_findings.description: Document involves Jorge Raul Roblejo, associated with political prisoners
relevant_findings.direct_quote: SUBJECTS: MR. LORIE, JORGE RAUL ROBLEJO, RES, POLIT ACT, TRA, ASSOC, POLIT PRISONERS
relevant_findings.significance: Potential political context or connection to broader investigation

relevant_findings.description: Highly restricted document with multiple classification levels
relevant_findings.direct_quote: CLASSIFICATION: Secret, 1B; IC4, CURRENT STATUS: Redact
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests sensitive information potentially related to the assassination investigation

relevant_findings.description: Document references 'JORGE SERGIO OSWALDO' in connection with Cuban liberation committee
relevant_findings.direct_quote: RAUL ROBLEJO LORIE, IS - CUBA and SERGIO OSWALDO BETANCOURT COLLAZO, aka - PSI, IS - CUBA
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests potential connections to Cuban exile networks and intelligence operations

relevant_findings.description: CIA and FBI inter-agency communication about Cuban liberation group
relevant_findings.direct_quote: COMITE PRO-LIBERACION DE LOS CIEN (CIPLIC - COMMITTEE FOR THE LIBERATION OF THE ONE HUNDRED) IS - CUBA
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates active intelligence monitoring of Cuban exile groups during Cold War period

relevant_findings.description: Cuban intelligence and diplomatic connections involving potential informants
relevant_findings.direct_quote: ROBLEJO has been in contact with REINALDO ABREU, Attache at the Cuban Embassy in Mexico City and connected with Cuban Intelligence
relevant_findings.significance: Reveals complex diplomatic networks and potential intelligence operations involving Cuban officials

relevant_findings.description: Cuban exile and diplomatic networks potentially relevant to assassination investigation
relevant_findings.direct_quote: LUIS RICARDO ALONSO, former Cuban Ambassador to London, who defected in 1965, has been in correspondence with ABREU
relevant_findings.significance: Highlights interconnected networks of Cuban diplomats and exiles during the Cold War period
